name: Euristiq
tagline: Easy to work with. Custom IoT and Web applications
description:
Euristiq is an engineering company, that specializes in complicated solutions.
Our typical project is a software application with a complex back-end and front-end that is made to be highly secure, performant, available, scalable and reliable.
Most of our employees are senior level engineers with fluent English.
We are experts in JavaScript, C#, Java and Embedded C.
